Package gui.mainWindow

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Action class for using with key binding
    Action.CompletedAction
    toggle completion of tasks
    Action.DeleteAction
    Delete task
    Action.ExitAction
    exit the program
    Action.ExpandAction
    expand the mainJFrame
    Action.GCalendarAction
    login to google Calendar
    Action.GCalendarOutAction
    logout from google calendar
    Action.HelpAction
    toggle help
    Action.ImportantAction
    toggle important of tasks
    Action.ListAction
    list all tasks
    Action.OverdueAction
    check overdue
    Action.RedoAction
    redo operations
    Action.UndoAction
    undo the most recent task
    AutoCompletion
    auto completion textbox (will implement autocompletion in V0.3)
    Binding
    for making hotkey on mainJFrame
    MainJFrame
    Main Window that interacts with users.
